MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_45: Woofy is a free webcomic downloader
English.Char_Desc_80: Woofy is a free webcomic downloader, designed for simplicity and ease of use.
English.Char_Desc_250: Woofy is a free webcomic downloader, designed for simplicity and ease of use. Its purpose is to help you download and keep an archive of your favorite online comics, while not getting in your way too much.
English.Char_Desc_450: Woofy is a free webcomic downloader, designed for simplicity and ease of use. Its purpose is to help you download and keep an archive of your favorite online comics, while not getting in your way too much. It can download a fixed number of comics, or all the comics published since the last time it was run. Also, it uses comic information files in order to know how to download a certain comic, so it can be easily extended to support new comics.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Woofy is a free webcomic downloader, designed for simplicity and ease of use. Its purpose is to help you download and keep an archive of your favorite online comics, while not getting in your way too much.
Main features: * A completely rewritten download engine, with definitions written in a Python-like DSL. * An improved user interface, with more information about the download process. * Downloads comics from start to finish, and not backwards. * Can embed additional metadata such as the title and description inside each downloaded strip (the metadata can be viewed using any image viewer that supports the XMP standard, such as XnView MP or Zoner Photo Studio) * The settings files are stored under each user's profile - should fix some issues with Windows 7/Vista. * Open source, licensed under the GPL.
